title: Christmas videos volume 3 (S)
brief_description: This tape features 6 Christmas cartoons including: “Hector’s hectic life”; Prince’s plans for a trouble free Christmas are threatened by a litter of puppies: “Little Grey Neck”; Little Grey Neck learns to fend for himself when the other geese migrate South leaving him alone: “Hamateur night”; Fleabag McPoodle and his singing insects and a wolf reciting Shakespeare are only some of the contestants in this amusing competition: “Mutt and Jeff in westward whoa”; Mutt and Jeff are up to no good in the wild west: “The Tin soldier”; the adventures of a little tin soldier: “The Christmas visitor”; a cartoon version of the famous poem, ‘twas the night before Christmas’.
